improvements.description: Run 4 represents the fourth iteration of automated E2E testing on the Pulse app, building on fixes from three prior rounds.

rounds.description: Baseline run establishing initial test suite coverage across 11 spec files. Identified widespread selector fragility, missing auth state setup, and skipped tests due to unimplemented features.
Stabilised core navigation and public-facing tests. Reduced selector timeouts by switching to more resilient locators. Fixed modal open/close assertions that were triggering false negatives.
Addressed auth-gated test failures by improving login flow helpers. Reduced total failures significantly. Identified that 185 tests are intentionally skipped pending feature completion.

Run 4 (2026-02-23): 103 passed, 21 failed, 185 skipped out of 309 total. Pass rate of 83.1% excluding skips. Remaining 21 failures break down as: 16 auth-gated tests requiring a logged-in business owner account (not yet wired into CI), 3 app behaviour gaps (Terms of Service modal, verification prompt copy, SubmissionModal description field), and 2 test infrastructure issues (Settings tab and Weekly Goals assertions need selector updates). No regressions introduced relative to Run 3.
